Text: I'll seed this for a few weeks, but my upload speed is only 180 kb/s, so I'm relying on help from others to seed this as well. Thanks :-)

Hey, there.  Whenever I try to start the first patch, I get "The Setup has detected that the installed game region for this update is incorrect.  This update requires a different game region in order to be installed."  Any help here would be greatly appreciated.

Hey sorry for the late reply, in which case in the two days you probably figured something out, but try this.


http://www.simprograms.com/the-sims/the-sims-3/the-sims-3-patches/patches-the-sims-3/

I downloaded the majority off there, this was just to not have to download them all together.
This is for the .00002 versions which is worldwide.

Your game likely has a slightly different version, check the very end, where 1 is english, 2 is wordwide, 3 is asia, 4 is japan, and 17 is digital copy. (well they roughly follow those numbers)
Check which version you have and then look for the correct ones in there, it's pretty complete.
